page.title: 07 A Day in the life of George
page.content: On Sunday I go to 8.30 a.m. Mass at Cotton. We leave daddy at home milking the cows.Then we all have a good break fast of eggs and bacon. While daddy works in the garden Francis,Joanna, Michael and l go and play cricket in the field but Fleet,the dog,keeps running off with the ball so then we play French cricket. Sometimes Francis and I go to the river for a walk. When we take our binoculars we can see lots of wildlife like wild ducks,herons,blue tits,yellow wagtails,sparrows,house martins and even some trout. Then we come home to a lovely cooked dinner like meat, stuffing,gravy,potatoes and cauliflower. After a late dinner we help to fetch the cows in for daddy, ready for milking. After tea we have a bath and get ready for bed.Sometimes I come down stairs again to watch T.V.for a short while before I get into bed.
